name: Path M Placenta
title: Pathologic M
notes:
**Note 1:**  Genital metastasis (vagina, ovary, broad ligament, fallopian tube) is classified T2. Any involvement of non-genital structures, whether by direct invasion or metastasis is described using the M classification.

**Note 2:**  All lymph node involvement for GTT is considered M1b.  Lymph node involvement, whether of regional or distant nodes, is coded in distant metastasis. 

**Note 3:**  When both the Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and metastatic detail are available, record the code with metastatic detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage.
